description: The young Gundam Fighter who represents the space colony of Neo China. As the heir to the 4,000-year tradition of the legendary Shaolin Temple, Sai has pledged to win the 13th Gundam Fight in order to restore the temple`s lost glory. In addition to being a master martial artist, he`s also an excellent cook, renowned for his superb fried rice. While the irrepressible Sai is exciteable, mischievous, and fun-loving, he has a strong sense of duty and is prepared to face any danger in order to uphold his family`s legacy.
name: Sai Saishii
